---
name: Phase/Sprint EPIC
about: Checklist-driven EPIC for a phase or sprint
labels: documentation, enhancement
---

# EPIC: <Phase/Sprint Name>

Branch: <feature/phaseX-...>
Direction Doc: <docs/development/...>

## Scope

- Goals
- Out of scope
- Risks & mitigations

## Pillars (Checklists)

- [ ] Pillar 1
  - [ ] Item A
  - [ ] Item B
- [ ] Pillar 2
  - [ ] Item C

## Milestones & Branching

- Work on dedicated branch; merge to `develop` at completion.
- Follow dev flow: commit → `pnpm reset` → commit generated → push.

## References

- Links to related issues/PRs
